https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/UBeg013iIYqSeFRBjZuYTkzHJK.jpg A father of the bride (Eamonn Hunt), usually a teetotaler, gets drunk to cope with the anxiety of delivering his reception speech, because he has a stutter. Mayhem ensues, and the wedding party, including the best man (Cillian Murphy), try to do damage control. A Man of Few Words
